memberdef.name: ON_ERR_GOTO
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if ((res) != FPGA_OK) { \ print_err((desc), (res)); \ s_error_count += 1; \ goto label; \ } \ } while (0)

memberdef.name: ASSERT_GOTO
memberdef.initializer: do { \ if ((condition) == 0) { \ fprintf(stderr, "Error %s\n", desc); \ s_error_count += 1; \ goto label; \ } \ } while (0)
